item.title: What is Blockchain Technology?
item.description: If you’ve been keeping up with the latest in the tech world, you’ve probably heard of blockchain technology. But what is it? In its simplest form, a blockchain is a digital ledger of transactions. But what makes it so special is that it’s distributed across a network of computers, making it virtually tamper-proof. That means that blockchain technology has the potential to revolutionize everything from how we store data to how we conduct transactions.
